channel.title: Lion Heart village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Lion Heart village" - Need any player, who's looking for a nice great village. Enter, if you are brave enough, and will try anything to help!!

item.title: Lion Heart
item.content:encoded: bold textHello.Im Kevin N.I am the Leader of the Lion Heart Village.I am looking for Brave people to join my village.It new so it not as good as most villages but we will be great!!!.So Join Lion Heart !! ITS A LONG HARD ROAD WAY TO FAME BUT BE BRAVE AND COME JOIN ^ ^

item.title: Lion Heart village
item.content:encoded:
Lion Heart village

Come join this soon to be growing village!! I am an experienced player, who wil guide you through any questions you need, and me, and the village Leader are the best!! I WILL JOIN, so help WILL arrive, Expect lots of potions and permanent items, not to mentionâ€¦.. the experience of helping a future great village.

1. If you are looking for a future outstanding village.
2. If you are looking for some help.
3. If you are active or BRAVE enough to enter!!

COME JOIN THE LION HEART village
